Test Name: Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia (CAH) Pediatric Profile 6, Comprehensive Screen
Purpose: To screen for and assist in the diagnosis of Congenital Adrenal Hyperplasia by analyzing the Pediatric Profile 6 panel.
Container: Pediatric SST (Serum Separator Tube) or heparinized vacutainer (green top)
Equipment: Micropipettes, centrifuge, incubator, vortex mixer, plate reader or automated analyzer
